content: Cost too much to get the order
Not happy about this. No ones business but mine.
They will never accept my order to my favorite restaurant
First order was great. Every order after has been a hassle I even pay for gh+ and I either don't get my food or the order gets canceled.
"menu items are not available" The app just stopped working recently, I can't order anything.
complications with my order not going through lost out on my food

Terrible do not use this app. Food is constantly very late. It will be an hour to get McDonald's from down the street. Often they will just push the delivery window back again and again and then they will just cancel your order after it's been delayed multiple times.
